    • Method Detail

      • getOrder

        public int[] getOrder()
        This method is used to get a random order of the terms in a selected table without repetition.
        Returns:
        orderArray - this method returns a table of integers, containing indexes of terms in a selected table, in a random order, without repetition.

      • getTwoOtherButtons

        public int[] getTwoOtherButtons(int indexOfCorrect,
                                int size)
        This method allows to obtain two random integers in a given interval, excluding one value, without repetition.
        Parameters:
        indexOfCorrect - is the integer to be excluded.
        size - is the interval in which the two random integers are to be in.
        Returns:
        otherButtonsIndexes - this method returns a table of integers, containing the two random integers.

      • isTheAnswerCorrect

        public boolean isTheAnswerCorrect(java.lang.String myAnswer,
                                  java.lang.String correctAnswer)
        This method checks if user input matches the required value.
        Parameters:
        myAnswer - is the user input.
        correctAnswer - is the required value that the user input is compared to.
        Returns:
        - this method returns true when user input matches the required value and false otherwise.
